title: Why does she see dreams of her dead relatives, is this from Allah?
transcript: Shan from Germany okay uh my wife she mostly dreams of uh her dead relatives talking to her or like ask like saying things to her uh could there be any specific reason because we know that dreams are one of the things that comes from Allah directly no most likely this is from shaan messing up with her head she should not eat a lot before before going to bed and inshallah she will not have such dreams
